name: Financial Department
description: The Financial Department is a well-organized workspace with rows of desks, each occupied by diligent-looking employees. Neatly stacked files line the shelves, giving the impression of a busy and efficient department. You notice some documents on a [coworker's desk].
short_description: A well-organized workspace filled with busy employees. A [coworker's desk] has some documents that seem out of place
directions: The Financial Department is connected to the Marketing Department to the north, the Archives Room to the south and the Reception Area to the west.
